description: Virgil Sainclair & Tristan Paris. There is no hesitation as Tristan and Virgil feed off each other's energy.  The action is hot and furious as Virgil plunders Tristan's hole and mouth with his uncut mantool, shoving the hard thick prod in and out of his willing partner, until they both unload gobs of manjuice.
title: Sit Tight, Scene #04
